pages.text: 2|238|namaazon ka, vishesh roop se maadhyamik namaaz (asr) ka dhyaan rakho[1] tatha allaah ke lie vinay poorvak khade raho.

2|239|aur yadi tumhen bhay[1] ho, to paidal ya savaar (jaise sambhav ho) namaaz padho, phir jab nishchint ho jao, to allaah ne tumhen jaise sikhaaya hai, jise pahale tum nahin jaanate the, vaise allaah ko yaad karo.

2|240|aur jo tumamen se mar jaayen tatha patniyaan chhod jaayen, ve apanee patniyon ke lie ek varsh tak, unahen kharch dene tatha (ghar se) na nikaalane kee vasiyyat kar jaayen, yadi ve svayan nikal jaayen[1] tatha saamaany niyamaanusaar apane vishay mein kuchh bhee karen, to tumapar koee dosh nahin. allaah prabhaavashaalee tatvagy hai.
2|241|tatha jin striyon ko talaaq dee gayee ho, to unhen bhee uchit roop se saamagree milanee chaahie. ye aagyaakaariyon par aavashyak hai.
2|242|isee prakaar allaah tumhaare lie apanee aayaton ko ujaagar kar deta hai, taaki tum samajho.

2|243|kya aapane unakee dasha par vichaar nahin kiya, jo apane gharon se maut ke bhay se nikal gaye[1], jabaki unakee sankhya hazaaron mein thee, to allaah ne unase kaha ki mar jao, phir unhen jeevit kar diya. vaastav mein, allaah logon ke lie bada upakaaree hai, parantu adhikaansh log krtagyata nahin karate.
2|244|aur tum allaah (ke dharm ke samarthan) ke lie yudhd karo aur jaan lo ki allaah sab kuchh sunata-jaanata hai.
2|245|kaun hai, jo allaah ko achchha udhaar[1] deta hai, taaki allaah use usake lie kaee guna adhik kar de? aur allaah hee thoda aur adhik karata hai aur usee kee or tum sab phere jaoge.
